alert.note: Alert for Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 23 at 4:40AM PDT until October 23 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 5 AM PDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. * WHERE...Owens Valley. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 5 AM PDT Sunday. For the Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 8 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
